name: Robin Clood
description:
Save the poor farmer's dried up fields with the help of your friendly vigilante cloud!

Steal water from the good old fat rich and water the dying crops while dodging weather manipulation missiles!

INPUT:  Use the cloud's shadow as a target to aim ans SPACE bar to pump and dump.

Made for a GameJam at Technocité

Music: Lucid Green https://lucidgreen.bandcamp.com/
